tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE e_waste_recycling_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    recycling_initiative VARCHAR(255),
    recycling_rate DECIMAL(5,2),
    impact_report TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE e_waste_recycling_data (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  center_id INT,
  date DATE NOT NULL,
  weight_kg DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  impact_score INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (center_id) REFERENCES e_waste_recycling_centers(center_id)
);

CREATE TABLE recycling_initiatives (
  initiative_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  initiative_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  city VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE e_waste_recycling_centers(
  center_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  center_name TEXT,
  location TEXT,
  capacity INT
)

CREATE TABLE e_waste_collection(
  collection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  center_id INT,
  collection_date DATE,
  collected_items TEXT[],
  FOREIGN KEY (center_id) REFERENCES e_waste_recycling_centers(center_id)
)

CREATE TABLE e_waste_impact(
  impact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  collection_id INT,
  impact_type TEXT,
  impact_description TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (collection_id) REFERENCES e_waste_collection(collection_id)
)

CREATE TABLE e_waste_stats(
  stats_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  collection_id INT,
  recycling_rate DECIMAL,
  impact_score DECIMAL,
  FOREIGN KEY (collection_id) REFERENCES e_waste_collection(collection_id)
)

CREATE TABLE e_waste_reports(
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  stats_id INT,
  report_date DATE,
  report_text TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (stats_id) REFERENCES e_waste_stats(stats_id)
)
